message: Bob, I'm offering you my product at a price of $1,250,000.  I believe this is a fair price considering its value to you.  Let me know your thoughts.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $1,150,000. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Bob, I understand your position, but $1,150,000 is simply too low for me.  I'm willing to come down a bit further to $1,200,000. This is a fair price considering the value you place on the product.  Let's try to reach an agreement.
